verses.text: GREAT God, whose universal sway All known and unknown worlds obey, Now give the kingdom to thy Son, Extend his power, exalt his throne.
The scepter well becomes his hands; All heaven submits to his commands; His justice shall protect the just, And pride and rage prevail no more.
With power he vindicates the just, And treads th' oppressor in the dust; His righteous government shall last, Till days, and years, and time be past.
